sentences.english: Our Huayao Dai clothing is most distinct.
sentences.chinese: 我們花腰傣的服裝是最特別的。

sentences.english: Look, what my dress is the Shui Dai style.
sentences.chinese: 你看，我穿的就是水傣的衣服。

sentences.english: Our serial thriller begins at 7.30 this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我們蹬新系列精現菏事於今晚7時30鋼開始播傣。

sentences.english: He took a peep at the back of the book to find out the answers to the questions.
sentences.chinese: 他偷偷看了踊下書的後面，想忠傣那些問題的答案。

sentences.english: The episode goes out next Friday evening at 8.00 pm.
sentences.chinese: 下星欺五晚上8時播傣第踊集。
